pullRequest.title: [sonos] Avoid concurrent execution of the polling job
pullRequest.bodyText:
Optimize the UPnP calls in the polling job
Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier lg.hc@free.fr

commit.message:
[sonos] Avoid concurrent execution of the polling job

Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier <lg.hc@free.fr>

nodes.bodyText: While you are changing code here anyway: Can you convert the runnable to a private void poll()?

commit.message:
Convert the runnable to a method

Change the order of fields declaration

Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier <lg.hc@free.fr>

nodes.bodyText:
I agree that the null-check like it was before does nothing,  but I wonder if removing is the correct way. Are you sure that every access to service is null-safe? Otherwise it would be probably better to throw an IllegalArgumentException.
The correct way would obviously be to add proper null-annotations, but that is out-of-scope of this PR.

commit.message:
Optimize the UPnP calls in the polling job

Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier <lg.hc@free.fr>

Avoid calling action GetRemainingSleepTimerDuration for a group slave member

Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier <lg.hc@free.fr>

nodes.bodyText: Why did you change the way this was implemented? It looks like it was intended to update properties if they haven't changed. Now you are updating the properties every time.

commit.message:
Cancel job anyway

Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier <lg.hc@free.fr>
